amendment.description: To improve educational assistance for members of the Armed Forces and veterans in order to enhance recruitment and retention for the Armed Forces.

action.text: Amendment SA 4764 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4763. (consideration: CR S4135) To improve educational assistance for members of the Armed Forces and veterans in order to enhance recruitment and retention for the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4764 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4763.
